author: Petertoshi Nakamoto
title: Petercoin
description: Hey Peter! Cardano is missing an element of "fun" that would otherwise assist in introducing new users to the platform.

assessments.note: I am not sure whimsicality is necessary for the cardano project for now
Does not have anything to do with creating a developer ecosystem.
There is no information on how this proposal will address the challenge.
The proposal does not address the need to increase the number of developers building on Cardano, improve the developer experience, or accelerate development.

This proposal does not seem to address the challenge brief in any meaningful way. Would love to understand how this coin would help achieve goals and mission of Cardano community. I fail to understand it in its current form. How can dev ecosystem be better of with its introduction? Unclear. Would have been better to include clearer statements.
No proof of experience and no real plan.
There is no information provided on how the proposer would make their coin "fun". Minting a coin is the easy part.
There is no reasonable plan. There is no relevant information about the team, their experiences and skills.
The proposal does not provide any details about the experience of the development team.

There is not enough information that would help determine what this proposal is exactly about. Things like references to experiences from past to establish validity of presenters, or presentation of sensible plan and budget. It really doesn't say what and how and why this budget exactly, etc. I suggest working on these core elements first prior seeking investments from community.
Not enough informations were provided, no clear projects.

Anyone can mint a coin so I expect them to be able to accomplish that part at least. Without a healthy ecosystem around a "fun" coin, I would expect to see a website and social media accounts at least trying to make progress. The $50,000 requested is also outlandish without MUCH more detail,
There is no description of how the proposal will address the challenge and what is the feasibility of the proposal.
The proposal does not provide any justification for the level of funding requested.

Proposal reads more like a concept/idea without means of getting it off the ground just yet. There is no clear roadmap or milestones that could help determine that direction in a greater sense. Nor do authors make any attempt to highlight what success could look like, KPIs, or if they foresee any challenges/risks associated with their plans. These need to be all added before community can take a leap of considering it to fund.

solution: PeterCoin would help to deliver this missing whimsicality, creating utilities such as PeterSwap and decentralized games to introduce users.
experience: We are a team of dedicated developers working to realize our vision of a decentralized future, and introducing new users is our top priority
